    EventController
    EventController manages all logic related to Event creation, modification, retrieval, deletion, and real-time updates.
    EventControllerTest
    JUnit 4 + Mockito tests for EventController.
    FirebaseManager
    FirebaseManager centralizes all Firestore and Storage operations.
    LotteryController
    LotteryController manages all lottery-related operations: creating lotteries, adding entrants, conducting draws, and persisting results in Firestore.
    ProfileController
    ProfileController manages all user profile operations: retrieving, updating, and deleting profiles from Firestore.
    QRCodeHandler
    QRCodeHandler handles generating and decoding QR codes for events and users.
    SignUpController
    SignUpController handles user registration and role setup.
